name: Heracross
description:
It loves sweet nectar. To keep all the nectar to
itself, it hurls rivals away with its prized horn.

attacks.name: Single-Horn Throw
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. If both of them are heads, this attack does 70 more damage.

name: Burmy
description:
To shelter itself from cold, wintry winds, it covers
itself with a cloak made of twigs and leaves.

name: Mothim
description:
It loves the honey of flowers and steals honey
collected by Combee.

name: Combee
description:
At night, Combee sleep in a group of about a
hundred, packed closely together in a lump.

name: Vespiquen
description:
It houses its colony in cells in its body and
releases various pheromones to make those
grubs do its bidding.

attacks.name: Reckless Charge
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 30 damage to itself.

name: Cherubi
description:
It nimbly dashes about to avoid getting pecked
by bird Pokémon that would love to make off
with its small, nutrient-rich storage ball.

name: Cherrim
description:
As a bud, it barely moves. It sits still, placidly
waiting for sunlight to appear.

attacks.name: Worry Seed
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused.

name: Cherrim
description:
After absorbing plenty of sunlight, Cherrim takes
this form. It's full of energy while it's like this,
and its liveliness will go on until sundown.

attacks.name: Leech Seed
attacks.effect: Heal 20 damage from this Pokémon.

name: Carnivine
description:
It attracts prey with its sweet-smelling saliva, then
chomps down. It takes a whole day to eat prey.

abilities.name: Power Link
abilities.effect: If you have Arceus or Arceus ex in play, attacks used by this Pokémon do +30 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

abilities.name: Forest Breath
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, you may take a Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to 1 of your Pokémon.

name: Houndour
description:
It is smart enough to hunt in packs. It uses a
variety of cries for communicating with others.

name: Houndoom
description:
If you are burned by the flames it shoots from its
mouth, the pain will never go away.

attacks.name: Corner
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't retreat.

name: Heatran
description:
It dwells in volcanic caves. It digs in with its
cross-shaped feet to crawl on ceilings and walls.

abilities.name: Speed Link
abilities.effect: If you have Arceus or Arceus ex in play, this Pokémon has no Retreat Cost.

attacks.name: Ragin' Mad Strike
attacks.effect: If this Pokémon has damage on it, this attack does 40 more damage.

name: Marill
description:
The fur on its body naturally repels water. It can
stay dry even when it plays in the water.

name: Azumarill
description:
Its long ears are superb sensors. It can distinguish
the movements of things in water and tell what
they are.

name: Barboach
description:
Its two whiskers provide a sensitive radar. Even in
muddy waters, it can detect its prey's location.

name: Whiscash
description:
It is extremely protective of its territory. If any
foe approaches, it attacks using vicious tremors.

attacks.name: Thrash
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 60 more damage. If tails, this Pokémon also does 20 damage to itself.

name: Snorunt
description:
It is said that several Snorunt gather under giant
leaves and live together in harmony.

name: Froslass
description:
When it finds humans or Pokémon it likes,
it freezes them and takes them to its chilly
den, where they become decorations.

attacks.name: Blizzard
attacks.effect: This attack also does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

name: Snover
description:
During cold seasons, it migrates to the
mountain's lower reaches. It returns to the
snow-covered summit in the spring.

name: Abomasnow
description:
It lives a quiet life on mountains that are
perpetually covered in snow. It hides itself
by whipping up blizzards.

abilities.name: Vigor Link
abilities.effect: If you have Arceus or Arceus ex in play, attacks used by this Pokémon cost 1 less Energy.

abilities.name: Snowy Terrain
abilities.effect: During Pokémon Checkup, if this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, do 10 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Palkia
description:
It soars across the sky in a form that greatly resembles the
creator of all things. Perhaps this imitation of appearance is
Palkia's strategy for gaining Arceus's powers.

attacks.name: Zone Smash
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 60 more damage.

name: Phione
description:
When the water warms, they inflate the flotation sac
on their heads and drift languidly on the sea
in packs.

attacks.name: Water Pulse
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

name: Pikachu
description:
When it is angered, it immediately discharges the
energy stored in the pouches in its cheeks.

attacks.name: Spark
attacks.effect: This attack also does 10 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

name: Raichu
description:
Its tail discharges electricity into the ground,
protecting it from getting shocked.

abilities.name: Resilience Link
abilities.effect: If you have Arceus or Arceus ex in play, this Pokémon takes −30 damage from attacks.

attacks.name: Spark
attacks.effect: This attack also does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

name: Electrike
description:
It stores static electricity in its fur for discharging.
It gives off sparks if a storm approaches.

name: Manectric
description:
It stimulates its own muscles with electricity, so
it can move quickly. It eases its soreness with
electricity, too, so it can recover quickly as well.

attacks.name: Flash
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, if the Defending Pokémon tries to use an attack, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack doesn't happen.

name: Clefairy
description:
It is said that happiness will come to those who
see a gathering of Clefairy dancing under a
full moon.

name: Clefable
description:
A timid fairy Pokémon that is rarely seen, it will
run and hide the moment it senses people.

attacks.name: Moonblast
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, attacks used by the Defending Pokémon do −30 damage.

name: Gastly
description:
It wraps its opponent in its gas-like body,
slowly weakening its prey by poisoning it
through the skin.

attacks.name: Astonish
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent reveals a random card from their hand and shuffles it into their deck.

name: Haunter
description:
It likes to lurk in the dark and tap shoulders
with a gaseous hand. Its touch causes endless
shuddering.

name: Gengar
description:
To steal the life of its target, it slips into
the prey's shadow and silently waits for
an opportunity.

attacks.name: Hypnoblast
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

name: Unown
description:
Its flat, thin body is always stuck on walls. Its shape
appears to have some meaning.

abilities.name: CHECK
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may choose either player. Look at the top card of that player's deck.

name: Rotom
description:
Its electricity-like body can enter some kinds
of machines and take control in order to make
mischief.

abilities.name: Speed Link
abilities.effect: If you have Arceus or Arceus ex in play, this Pokémon has no Retreat Cost.

attacks.name: Dash Attack
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon.

name: Sudowoodo
description:
Although it always pretends to be a tree,
its composition appears more similar to
rock than to vegetation.

attacks.name: Fighting Headbutt
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Pokémon ex, this attack does 30 more damage.

name: Phanpy
description:
This Pokémon lives and nests on a riverbank.
After playing in the mud, it won't be able to
settle down unless it washes its body.

name: Donphan
description:
Donphan is covered in tough hide, so even being
hit by a car won't faze this Pokémon. However, it
is extremely susceptible to rain.

attacks.name: Rolling Spin
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon's Rolling Spin attack does +60 damage.

name: Larvitar
description:
Born deep underground, this Pokémon becomes
a pupa after eating enough dirt to make a
mountain.

name: Pupitar
description:
Its shell is as hard as bedrock, and it is also very
strong. Its thrashing can topple a mountain.

name: Tyranitar
description:
Extremely strong, it can change the landscape.
It is so insolent that it doesn't care about others.

abilities.name: Power Link
abilities.effect: If you have Arceus or Arceus ex in play, attacks used by this Pokémon do +30 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Nosepass
description:
It moves less than an inch a year, but when
it's in a jam, it will spin and drill down into the
ground in a split second.

name: Meditite
description:
It never skips its daily yoga training. It heightens
its inner strength through meditation.

name: Medicham
description:
Through yoga training, it gained the psychic
power to predict its foe's next move.

attacks.name: Kick Shot
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

name: Gible
description:
It skulks in caves, and when prey or an enemy
passes by, it leaps out and chomps them.
The force of its attack sometimes chips its teeth.

name: Gabite
description:
In rare cases, it molts and sheds its scales.
Medicine containing its scales as an ingredient
will make a weary body feel invigorated.

attacks.name: Linear Attack
attacks.effect: This attack does 50 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

name: Zubat
description:
It emits ultrasonic waves from its mouth to check
its surroundings. Even in tight caves, Zubat flies
around with skill.

name: Golbat
description:
It loves to drink other creatures' blood. It's said
that if it finds others of its kind going hungry,
it sometimes shares the blood it's gathered.

name: Crobat
description:
Both of its legs have turned into wings. Without a
sound, Crobat flies swiftly toward its prey and
sinks its fangs into the nape of its target's neck.

abilities.name: Cunning Link
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, if you have Arceus or Arceus ex in play, you may do 30 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Croagunk
description:
Inflating its poison sacs, it fills the area with an
odd sound and hits flinching opponents with a
poison jab.

name: Toxicroak
description:
Swaying and dodging the attacks of its foes, it
weaves its flexible body in close, then lunges
out with its poisonous claws.

attacks.name: Toxic
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned. Do 20 damage to this Pokémon instead of the usual amount for this Special Condition.

name: Magnemite
description:
The electromagnetic waves emitted by the units
at the sides of its head expel antigravity, which
allows it to float.

name: Magneton
description:
Three Magnemite are linked by a strong magnetic
force. Earaches will occur if you get too close.

name: Magnezone
description:
As it zooms through the sky, this Pokémon seems
to be receiving signals of unknown origin while
transmitting signals of unknown purpose.

abilities.name: Resilience Link
abilities.effect: If you have Arceus or Arceus ex in play, this Pokémon takes −30 damage from attacks.

name: Mawile
description:
It uses its docile-looking face to lull foes into
complacency, then bites with its huge,
relentless jaws.

attacks.name: Iron Beam Breaker
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Pokémon, this attack does 30 more damage.

attacks.name: Defensive Unit
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes −20 damage from attacks.

name: Bronzor
description:
Ancient people believed that the pattern on
Bronzor's back contained a mysterious power.

name: Bronzong
description:
In ages past, this Pokémon was revered as a
bringer of rain. It was found buried in the ground.

attacks.name: Psychic
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 more damage for each Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

name: Dialga
description:
Radiant light caused Dialga to take on a form bearing a striking
resemblance to the creator Pokémon. Dialga now wields such
colossal strength that one must conclude this is its true form.

attacks.name: Time Mash
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, during your next turn, this Pokémon can't attack.

name: Giratina
description:
This Pokémon is said to live in a world on the
reverse side of ours, where common knowledge is
distorted and strange.

attacks.name: Crisis Dive
attacks.effect: Discard 2 random Energy from this Pokémon.

name: Eevee
description:
Its ability to evolve into many forms allows it to
adapt smoothly and perfectly to any environment.

name: Snorlax
description:
It is not satisfied unless it eats over 880 pounds
of food every day. When it is done eating, it
goes promptly to sleep.

attacks.name: Collapse
attacks.effect: This Pokémon is now Asleep.

name: Hoothoot
description:
It always stands on one foot. It changes feet so
fast, the movement can rarely be seen.

name: Noctowl
description:
Its eyes are specially developed to enable it to
see clearly even in murky darkness and minimal light.

attacks.name: Silent Wing
attacks.effect: Your opponent reveals their hand.

name: Starly
description:
They flock around mountains and fields, chasing
after bug Pokémon. Their singing is noisy and
annoying.

name: Staravia
description:
Recognizing their own weakness, they always live
in a group. When alone, a Staravia cries noisily.

name: Staraptor
description:
When Staravia evolve into Staraptor, they leave
the flock to live alone. They have sturdy wings.

attacks.name: Brave Bird
attacks.effect: This Pokémon also does 20 damage to itself.

name: Shaymin
description:
It can dissolve toxins in the air to instantly
transform ruined land into a lush field of flowers.

abilities.name: Sky Support
abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon is on your Bench, your Active Basic Pokémon's Retreat Cost is 1 less.

name: Arceus
description:
According to the legends of Sinnoh, this Pokémon
emerged from an egg and shaped all there is in
this world.

attacks.name: Power Blast
attacks.effect: Discard a random Energy from this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Fabled Luster
abilities.effect: This Pokémon can't be affected by any Special Conditions.

attacks.name: Ultimate Force
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 more damage for each of your Benched Pokémon.

name: Irida
effect: Heal 40 damage from each of your Pokémon that has any Energy attached.

name: Celestic Town Elder
effect: Put 1 random Basic Pokémon from your discard pile into your hand.

name: Barry
effect: During this turn, attacks used by your Snorlax, Heracross, and Staraptor cost 2 less Energy.

name: Adaman
effect: During your opponent's next turn, all of your Pokémon take −20 damage from attacks from your opponent's Pokémon.

name: Houndoom
description:
If you are burned by the flames it shoots from its
mouth, the pain will never go away.

attacks.name: Corner
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, the Defending Pokémon can't retreat.

name: Marill
description:
The fur on its body naturally repels water. It can
stay dry even when it plays in the water.

name: Unown
description:
Its flat, thin body is always stuck on walls. Its shape
appears to have some meaning.

abilities.name: CHECK
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may choose either player. Look at the top card of that player's deck.

name: Sudowoodo
description:
Although it always pretends to be a tree,
its composition appears more similar to
rock than to vegetation.

attacks.name: Fighting Headbutt
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Pokémon ex, this attack does 30 more damage.

name: Magnemite
description:
The electromagnetic waves emitted by the units
at the sides of its head expel antigravity, which
allows it to float.

name: Shaymin
description:
It can dissolve toxins in the air to instantly
transform ruined land into a lush field of flowers.

abilities.effect: As long as this Pokémon is on your Bench, your Active Basic Pokémon's Retreat Cost is 1 less.

abilities.effect: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, you may take a Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to 1 of your Pokémon.

abilities.effect: During Pokémon Checkup, if this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, do 10 damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.effect: This attack does 50 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon.

effect: During your opponent's next turn, all of your Pokémon take −20 damage from attacks from your opponent's Pokémon.

abilities.effect: Once during your turn, if this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, you may take a Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to 1 of your Pokémon.

abilities.effect: This Pokémon can't be affected by any Special Conditions.

attacks.effect: This attack does 20 more damage for each of your Benched Pokémon.

abilities.effect: This Pokémon can't be affected by any Special Conditions.
